description:
Yachiru encounters a Soul Reaper saving a girl from a Hollow, and quickly recognizes him as Masayoshi, her old friend. As the two celebrate their reunion, Yachiru learns that “Mappy” has lost his wife to a Hollow. Since then, Masayoshi has sworn to kill all Hollows for the people of the Rukon District, and for his late wife. But something about Masayoshi’s story does not sit well with Yachiru.
Source: crunchyroll
